item.title: [pi]server help needed
item.dc:creator: @zingerman111 zingerman111
item.description:
@zingerman111 wrote:

*Alright guys ive been working on a project 317 loading 602+ and now i can’t figure out how to let my admins
trade if anyone can please help me.

*one more thing i tried the code given to me earlier about making the “pring” for owner only can someone please correct
it or tell me what was wrong…

if ((wearID == 773) && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("jahid") { return; } else { C.sendMessage("This is an Owner only item.");} return false;

*third thing i wanted to know was how do i make it so owner can not lose items.

Read full topic
